traits.Fey Ancestry: The choldrith has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can\'t put the choldrith to sleep.
traits.Spider Climb: The choldrith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the choldrith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
traits.Web Sense: While in contact with a web, the choldrith knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
traits.Web Walker: The choldrith ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
